title: Did you really meet his wife in a triple murderer's grave?
subtitle: The story of June 2019 on Twitter had a lot of transformations and transformations, as well as a happy ending. But was it "exactly right" as his author claimed?
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: @SixthFormPoet is a viral story on Twitter about meeting his wife on the side of a three-way murderer's grave that was objectively accurate.
